title: Alone at home
creator_credit: Alfred Higgins Productions and Stephen Wallen
brief_description: Clearly outlines procedures that children should be aware of when circumstances necessitate their remaining at home on their own. Highlights the need to keep a list of important phone numbers handy and when to use them; the need to be wary of letting strangers into the house or letting them know parents are out; how to work locks, thermostats etc… Suitable for years prep-6.
